title: Remove Anivia from the game.
body: **She has ruined the opportuinity for Trundle's Q to be named Frostbite as her E currently holds the title.{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} If anything rename anivia's E to chomp and trundle's Q to Frostbite**

replies.body: Your idea is ridiculous and an obvious troll stop posting here
